channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-20030|2024-09-17T01:01:49.355Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libexif
item.description: An error when processing the EXIF_IFD_INTEROPERABILITY and EXIF_IFD_EXIF tags within libexif version 0.6.21 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

item.title: CVE-2018-20033|2024-09-17T02:11:14.068Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- flexnet%20publisher
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability in lmgrd and vendor daemon components of FlexNet Publisher version 11.16.1.0 and earlier could allow a remote attacker to corrupt the memory by allocating / deallocating memory, loading lmgrd or the vendor daemon and causing the heartbeat between lmgrd and the vendor daemon to stop. This would force the vendor daemon to shut down. No exploit of this vulnerability has been demonstrated.

item.title: CVE-2017-16914|2024-09-17T01:42:05.146Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- linux%20kernel
item.description: The "stub_send_ret_submit()" function (drivers/usb/usbip/stub_tx.c) in the Linux Kernel before version 4.14.8, 4.9.71, 4.1.49, and 4.4.107 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a specially crafted USB over IP packet.

item.title: CVE-2018-5819|2024-09-17T04:29:32.330Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libraw
item.description: An error within the "parse_sinar_ia()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.

item.title: CVE-2017-16912|2024-09-17T03:48:33.745Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- linux%20kernel
item.description: The "get_pipe()" function (drivers/usb/usbip/stub_rx.c) in the Linux Kernel before version 4.14.8, 4.9.71, and 4.4.114 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a specially crafted USB over IP packet.
